# MPMoviePlayerThumbnailImageKey | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ Media Player ](/documentation/mediaplayer)

- [ MPMoviePlayerThumbnailImageKey ](/documentation/MediaPlayer/MPMoviePlayerThumbnailImageKey)

-  MPMoviePlayerThumbnailImageKey 

Global Variable# MPMoviePlayerThumbnailImageKey

iOS 3.2–9.0DeprecatediPadOS 3.2–9.0DeprecatedMac Catalyst 13.1–13.1DeprecatedtvOSDeprecated

```
let MPMoviePlayerThumbnailImageKey: String
```

Deprecated

Use AVPlayerViewController in AVKit

## [Discussion](/documentation/MediaPlayer/MPMoviePlayerThumbnailImageKey#Discussion)

The value of this key is a [`UIImage`](/documentation/UIKit/UIImage) object containing the image that was obtained for the desired frame.
